title: Cuomo, de Blasio remain at odds over MTA
text: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority has a $9.8 billion capital budget gap, and no immediate resolution on how to pay for it. On Friday, Gov. Andrew Cuomo and New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio continued to trade barbs over how to split the funding gap â€” the latest tussle between the two Democratic leaders. The [...] The post Cuomo, de Blasio remain at odds over MTA appeared first on Politics on the Hudson. Click on the headline for the rest of this blog post ... ...
